description: Try our easy to follow Quick & Light Salmon Laksa recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Quick & Light Salmon Laksa Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 300g boneless salmon fillets, cut into 2cm pieces
4 cup fish stock (chicken or vegetable stock)
0.33 cup laksa paste (see basic laksa paste recipe)

recipeInstructions.text: Cook noodles following packet directions. Drain. Divide among 4 large serving bowls.
Heat a small frying pan over high heat. Lightly spray with oil. Cook salmon, turning, for 1-2 minutes or until cooked through. Transfer to a plate.

Heat a large saucepan over medium heat. Add paste and stir for 1 minute or until fragrant. Add stock and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Add fish sauce and bok choy and cook for 1-2 minutes or until bok choy wilts.
Place milk powder in a small bowl. Add 1/3 cup of cooking liquid from pan and stir until smooth. Add to pan with salmon and lime juice, stir and heat through. Ladle over noodles.
Serve topped with bean shoots, herbs and chilli.
